vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
τοί, ταί,
Epic dialect and poetry for οἱ or οἵ, αἱ or αἵ, nominative plural of ὁ and ὅ, frequently in [Refs 8th c.BC+], not in Ionic dialect Prose, rare in Trag., e.g. [Refs 4th c.BC+]: but in Doric dialect and certain other dialects as the Article, Ἱάρων.. καὶ τοὶ Συρακόσιοι [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: - an enclitic particle of asseveration by way of contrast; in sooth
vocabInfos.mediumDef: - an enclitic particle of asseveration by way of contrast; in sooth
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: (強調話語的可靠) 的確, 我告訴你說
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: (强调话语的可靠) 的确, 我告诉你说
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: chắc chắn; thực sự; tuy nhiên
